title: New Client Problems
body:
I heard that Riot was gonna switch everyone over to the new client at some point so I decided I should check it out. But after I updated to the new client, as soon as I started it up, nothing appeared on my screen. So I decided to check my task manager and it said it was there and that I could terminate it. After I terminated it, a blackish-blue box came up on my screen.  



http://imgur.com/Ykp4NCF

replies.body: same thing happened to me i have a post in the help&support area and it gave me a 30 mins que dodge ban because it happened 2 games in a row even after i restarted my client

Give your PC a quick reboot. If you see this issue crop up again, then your client is likely encountering an issue connecting to one or more of our servers. In this case, I'd recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure this isn't caused by a set of incompatible network settings on your local network.

Let me know if this helped.
